sentence.text: Droplets of blood ran over his fingers and dripped on to the floor .
The blood dripped from his gashed hand .
Blood dripped into the chalice .
Rain dripped outside , drummed heavily , then slackened again .
The team laughed and nodded their approval , continuing with their meal as the rain dripped steadily into the mess-tins and the mugs of tea .
Rain was dripping through the roof in several places , falling with a recurrent plop and splash on to the wet floor-boards .
The ground was soft once again beneath their feet , rain dripped from leaves and branches .
The rain dripped down his neck .
Sweat dripped into her eyes .
The sweat was dripping from her face on to her breasts which were already glistening with water like orb-shaped fruit in the rain .
Sweat dripped from Kruger 's purple face .
Trickles of sweat dripped from her hair and down her temples , leaving an itchy heat behind them .
To my amazement , they were burning brightly as the rain fell and water dripped from the ash trees .
Nutty practised the crawl in her bath and the water dripped down the light cord in the dining-room below and collected in the glass bowl-shaped shade .
Angle the condensation tray to that the water does n't drip onto the leaves and spoil them .
Water dripped off her hands , too , and her severe black bathing dress .
Her gown was almost wet through and water dripped from her long hair to the floor .
The steady trickle of blood from the corner of his mouth was dripping from his chin onto his coat front .
The sudden cool of evening made it advisable to keep the cooking fire alive and in the morning a cold , heavy dew dripped from the leaves .
I stayed there for three days , until the snow began to melt , dripping in stealthy drops from my little roof .
To keep Tubifex worms , the aquarium must have a layer of mud on the bottom and a supply of fresh-water continuously dripping into the aquarium .
The dark man sipped his beer , then rubbed his finger in the condensation that was dripping on the outside of the metal mug .
Grey ash dripped on cream sand .
A tear dripped onto my desk .
He watched his tears drip onto the floor and wondered from a great distance why he could not feel them running down his face .
The roof itself was holed in places , and melting snow dripped to the floor and spread in muddy puddles .
